title: Hour 3 - Dean Blandino (05-26-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Dean Blandino (05-26-20)
description:
Dean Blandino tries to help Dan understand the roll of the sky judge and how it will work in the NFL upcoming season. Dean says yes there is times that he would break the glass and buzz down to the field from the replay booth if something blatant was missed. Dean says he does not know why the replay booth did not get involved in the Saints vs Rams obvious missed call.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dean Blandino tries to help Dan understand the roll of the sky judge and how it will work in the NFL upcoming season. Dean says yes there is times that he would break the glass and buzz down to the field from the replay booth if something blatant was missed. Dean says he does not know why the replay booth did not get involved in the Saints vs Rams obvious missed call.
